short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced text styling for LinkedIn posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The LinkedIn Post Styler is a powerful browser extension designed to enhance your LinkedIn content creation experience by providing advanced text styling and formatting options. This tool transforms ordinary text into visually engaging, professional-looking posts that capture attention and improve readability.

The extension offers multiple sophisticated text styling options:

>Bold Styling: Converts text to a distinctive bold Unicode font
>Italic Styling: Transforms text into an elegant italic Unicode font
>Quote Insertion: Quickly add quotation marks to selected text or entire content
>Bullet Point Formatting: Easily convert text into a bulleted list
>Font Style Selection: Choose from multiple professional font families including Arial, Poppins, Roboto, Open Sans, and Montserrat
